DOC.brief_summary: This study 's purpose learn dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) affect HIV virus , immune system , hormone level , body composition quality life .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Evidence HIV1 infection HIV RNA < 50 copies/mL Stable antiretroviral treatment regimen least 8 week Age 18 year old Normal pap smear mammograph within 1 year ( female ) Normal prostatespecific antigen level one year , age adjust ( male ) Exclusion criterion : Active opportunistic infection malignancy localize cutaneous KS lesion Concurrent prior use within past 8 week DHA , testosterone , anabolic steroid , corticosteroid , megestrol acetate , growth hormone , IL2 , thalidomide Diagnosis AIDS Dementia Complex ( stage II high ) Active substance abuse ( e.g. , alcohol injection drug ) Evidence severe liver dysfunction hepatic transaminase great 3x upper normal limit Pregnant breastfeed History endocrinologicallyresponsive tumor ( e.g. , breast , ovarian , uterine , prostatic cancer , malignant melanoma )
